* Zyber smiled up at Rowdy Wolf, she wouldn't mind seeing what another 
wolf's den looked like.
She sighed and then looked out at the plain, the sun was beginning to go 
down and she would have to go home soon. She would visit with Rowdy for a 
mega-cycle or two but she did have to get back to her own den sooner or 
later.*

" Yes, I can come for a while.*

___________________________________________________________:):):):)

* Iris scanned the systems of the Ark, the shield wasn't holding and there 
were Predacon's everywhere! She scanned through the files and programs of 
the Ark but there wasn't much more that she could do, except increase the 
power of the shields and auto-guns.
So, as one resort that was exactly what she did, soon the shield around the 
base glew a brighter green and the charges from the auto-guns began to fire 
more quickly and heavily. For now that was all she could do, but at least no 
more Predacons could get into the base...and if they did they would get an 
over powered charge right where it hurt the most!*
